author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GILMA'S WEAKENING TREND EASES... ...STILL EXPECTED TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW AS IT NEARS HAWAII...
summary:
...GILMA'S WEAKENING TREND EASES... ...STILL EXPECTED TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW AS IT NEARS HAWAII...
 As of 11:00 PM HST Tue Aug 27
 the center of Gilma was located near 18.5, -144.5
 with movement W at 13 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Gilma (CP2/EP072024)
